item.title: Installing Python using Conda
item.description: This page is the first post in a series of introductory python tutorials: 1. Installing Python using Conda - this tutorial 2. Getting started with Jupyter 3. [Using Python packages]() 4. [Working with data]() 5. [Making figures in Python]() To begin using Python, we first need to install it. For these tutorials, we will be using Python 3.6, although any Python 3 should work. We use Python 3 as it is the “present and future of the language.
